languages.text: "Кроме того, горестные события произошли в столице вашей династии..." {n}Вигдис запинается.{/n} "Дом Версериан был признан виновным в организации бунтов, а также в замысле заговора против вас, Ваша Светлость. Решением губернатора Драйвстема род Версериан был казнен, порядок на планете полностью восстановлен".

traits.locale_text: "Кроме того, горестные события произошли в столице вашей династии..." {n}Вигдис запинается.{/n} "Дом Версериан был признан виновным в организации бунтов, а также в замысле заговора против вас, Ваша Светлость. Решением губернатора Драйвстема род Версериан был казнен, порядок на планете полностью восстановлен".
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "What is more, regrettable events have taken place in your dynasty's capital..." {n}Vigdis hesitates.{/n} "House Werserian has been found guilty of organising revolts and plotting a conspiracy against Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem has ordered the Werserians to be executed. Order has been fully restored on the planet."
languages.original_text: "Кроме того, горестные события произошли в столице вашей династии..." {n}Вигдис запинается.{/n} "Дом Версериан был признан виновным в организации бунтов, а также в замысле заговора против вас, Ваша Светлость. Решением губернатора Драйвстема род Версериан был казнен, порядок на планете полностью восстановлен".

Governor Drivestem ordered the Werserians to be executed. Order has been fully restored on the planet."

Governor Drivestem ordered the Werserians to be executed. Order has been fully restored on the planet."

Governor Drivestem has ordered the Werserians to be executed. Order has been fully restored on the planet."

Governor Drivestem has ordered the Werserians to be executed. Order has been fully restored on the planet."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “此外，王朝的首都发生了令人遗憾的事态……”{n}维格迪斯犹豫着开了口。{/n}“韦尔森家族被判处有罪，罪名是煽动叛乱，密谋反对大人您。总督已经下令处决了韦尔森家族所有成员，达戈努斯再次恢复了秩序。”
languages.original_text: "What is more, regrettable events have taken place in your dynasty's capital..." {n}Vigdis hesitates.{/n} "House Werserian has been found guilty of organising revolts and plotting a conspiracy against Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem has ordered the Werserians to be executed. Order has been fully restored on the planet."

traits.locale_text: “此外，王朝的首都发生了令人遗憾的事态……”{n}维格迪斯的声音变得结结巴巴。{/n}“韦尔森家族被判处有罪，罪名是煽动叛乱，密谋反对大人您。总督已经下令处决了韦尔森家族所有成员，达戈努斯再次恢复了秩序。”
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Zudem sind in der Hauptstadt Eurer Dynastie bedauerliche Dinge vorgefallen ..." {n}Vigdis stockt.{/n} "Haus Werserian wurde für schuldig befunden, Revolten organisiert und eine Verschwörung gegen Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft geplant zu haben. Gouverneur Drivestem hat angeordnet, dass die Werserians hingerichtet werden. Die Ordnung auf dem Planeten wurde vollständig wiederhergestellt."
languages.original_text: "What is more, regrettable events have taken place in your dynasty's capital..." {n}Vigdis hesitates.{/n} "House Werserian has been found guilty of organising revolts and plotting a conspiracy against Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem has ordered the Werserians to be executed. Order has been fully restored on the planet."

traits.locale_text: "Zudem sind in der Hauptstadt Eurer Dynastie bedauerliche Dinge vorgefallen ..." {n}Vigdis stockt.{/n} "Haus Werserian wurde für schuldig befunden, Revolten organisiert und eine Verschwörung gegen Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft geplant zu haben. Gouverneur Drivestem hat angeordnet, dass die Werserians hingerichtet werden. Die Ordnung auf dem Planeten wurde vollständig wiederhergestellt."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «Además, ha ocurrido algo trágico en la capital de su dinastía...». {n}Vigdis titubea.{/n} «La casa Werserian ha sido hallada culpable de organizar revueltas y conspirar contra usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El gobernador Drivestem ha ordenado ejecutar a los Werserian, y se ha restablecido el orden por completo en el planeta».
languages.original_text: "What is more, regrettable events have taken place in your dynasty's capital..." {n}Vigdis hesitates.{/n} "House Werserian has been found guilty of organising revolts and plotting a conspiracy against Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem has ordered the Werserians to be executed. Order has been fully restored on the planet."

traits.locale_text: «Además, ha ocurrido algo trágico en la capital de su dinastía...». {n}Vigdis traga saliva.{/n} «La casa Werserian ha sido hallada culpable de organizar revueltas y conspirar contra usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El gobernador Drivestem mandó ejecutar a los Werserian, y se ha restablecido el orden por completo en el planeta».
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « En outre, il se passe de bien tristes choses dans la capitale de votre dynastie... {n}dit Vigdis en hésitant.{/n} La maison Werserian a été reconnue coupable d'avoir organisé des révoltes et conspiré contre Votre Seigneurie. Le gouverneur Drivestem a exigé l'exécution de toute la famille et l'ordre a été totalement rétabli sur la planète. »
languages.original_text: "What is more, regrettable events have taken place in your dynasty's capital..." {n}Vigdis hesitates.{/n} "House Werserian has been found guilty of organising revolts and plotting a conspiracy against Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem has ordered the Werserians to be executed. Order has been fully restored on the planet."

traits.locale_text: « En outre, il se passe de tristes choses dans la capitale de votre dynastie... » {n}Vigdis marque une pause.{/n} « La maison Werserian a été reconnue coupable d'avoir organisé des révoltes et conspiré contre Votre Seigneurie. Le gouverneur Drivestem a exigé l'exécution de toute la famille et l'ordre a été totalement rétabli sur la planète. »
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「その上、あなたの王朝の首都で残念な出来事が起こりました…」{n}ヴィグディスは口ごもる。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家は反乱を組織し、閣下に対する陰謀を企てた罪で有罪になりました。ドライブステン総督はウェルザリアン家の処刑を命じました。この惑星の秩序は完全に回復されたのです」
languages.original_text: "What is more, regrettable events have taken place in your dynasty's capital..." {n}Vigdis hesitates.{/n} "House Werserian has been found guilty of organising revolts and plotting a conspiracy against Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem has ordered the Werserians to be executed. Order has been fully restored on the planet."

traits.locale_text: 「その上、あなたの王朝の首都で残念な出来事が起こりました…」{n}ヴィグディスは口ごもる。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家は反乱を組織し、閣下に対する陰謀を企てた罪で有罪になりました。ドライブステン総督はウェルザリアン家の処刑を命じました。この惑星の秩序は完全に回復されたのです」
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Dahası da var... Hanedanlığınızın başkentinde utanç verici olaylar gerçekleşti." {n}Vigdis duraksıyor.{/n} "Werserian Hanesi, isyan tertip etmekten ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne komplo kurmaktan suçlu bulundu. Vali Drivestem, Werserian Hanesi mensuplarının idamına karar verdi. Gezegende düzen yeniden sağlandı."
languages.original_text: "What is more, regrettable events have taken place in your dynasty's capital..." {n}Vigdis hesitates.{/n} "House Werserian has been found guilty of organising revolts and plotting a conspiracy against Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Governor Drivestem has ordered the Werserians to be executed. Order has been fully restored on the planet."

traits.locale_text: "Dahası da var... Hanedanlığınızın başkentinde utanç verici olaylar gerçekleşti." {n}Vigdis duraksıyor.{/n} "Werserian Hanesi, isyanlar düzenleme ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerine komplo kurma suçlamalarından suçlu bulundu. Vali Drivestem, Werserian Hanesi mensuplarının idamına karar verdi. Gezegende düzen yeniden sağlandı."
traits.speaker: VoxMaster
